类 World

  • java.lang.Object
    • World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the entire game world. (Designed to be instantiated just once for the whole game).

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int BANDIT_NUM 
      static int GIANT_BAT_NUM 
      static int SCREEN_HEIGHT_T
      Screen height, in tiles.

      Screen width, in tiles.
      static int SKELETON_NUM 
      static int TILE_SIZE
      Width of a tile, in pixels.
      static int ZOMBIE_NUM

    • 方法详细资料

      • update

        public void update(int dir_x,
                   int dir_y,
                   int delta,
                   boolean AIsOn,
                   boolean TIsOn)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Update the game state for a frame.
        参数:
        dir_x - The player's movement in the x axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        dir_y - The player's movement in the y axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        抛出:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • render

        public void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
                   boolean TIsOn)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Render the entire screen, so it reflects the current game state.
        参数:
        g - The Slick graphics object, used for drawing.
        抛出:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

      • CheckBlock

        public boolean CheckBlock(float dx,
                          float dy,
                          Unit unit)
        check the accessibility of the tile that this unit is going to
        参数:
        dx - distance the unit will move in this frame in x direction
        dy - distance the unit will move in this frame in x direction
        unit - the unit that can move
        返回:

      • renderPanel

        public void renderPanel(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        render the panel for status
        参数:
        g - Graphics
